name: O Flower Aid, O Earth Defend

system.story: Revitalizing plants and jagged stones grow, helping allies and hinder ing foes.

effect.before:
Until the start of your next turn, the area gains the following effects:

  • Once as a free maneuver at the start of your turn, you allow yourself and each ally in the area to spend any number of Recoveries.

  • The area is difficult terrain for enemies.

  • Each enemy who enters the area for the first time in a combat round or starts their turn there takes [[/damage @R]]{damage equal to your Reason score}.
effect.after: Persistent 1: The area remains until the start of your next turn. As a maneuver, you can move the area up to 5 squares. This ability ends if the area is ever not within your line of effect.
